mutants.code:
def bitwise_operations(a, b):
    bitwise_and = a | b
    bitwise_or = a | b
    bitwise_xor = a ^ b
    return [bitwise_and, bitwise_or, bitwise_xor]

def bitwise_operations(a, b):
    bitwise_and = a & b
    bitwise_or = a & b
    bitwise_xor = a ^ b
    return [bitwise_and, bitwise_or, bitwise_xor]

def bitwise_operations(a, b):
    bitwise_and = a & b
    bitwise_or = a ^ b
    bitwise_xor = a ^ b
    return [bitwise_and, bitwise_or, bitwise_xor]

def bitwise_operations(a, b):
    bitwise_and = a & b
    bitwise_or = a | b
    bitwise_xor = a | b
    return [bitwise_and, bitwise_or, bitwise_xor]
